00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_TRAITS_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_TRAITS_H_
00029 
00030 #include <tr1/type_traits>
00031 #include "compile_assert.h"
00032 
00033 namespace kche_tree {
00034 
00048 template <typename T>
00049 struct has_trivial_equal : public std::tr1::integral_constant<bool, std::tr1::is_fundamental<T>::value> {};
00050 
00051 // Forward-declare the templates provided here.
00052 template <typename T> struct Traits;
00053 template <typename T> struct AccumulationTraits;
00054 template <typename T, bool hasTrivialEqual> struct EqualTraits;
00055 template <typename T, bool hasTrivialCopy> struct CopyTraits;
00056 
00062 template <typename T>
00063 struct TraitsBase {
00064   typedef T Type; 
00065   static T zero() { return T(); } 
00066 };
00067 
00077 template <typename T>
00078 struct AccumulationTraits {
00079   // In case we need more precision, this should be specialized with a promotion of the T type.
00080   typedef T AccumulatorType; 
00081 };
00082 
00086 template <typename T>
00087 struct EqualTraits<T, true> {
00096   static bool equal_arrays(const T *p1, const T *p2, unsigned int size) {
00097     return memcmp(p1, p2, size * sizeof(T)) == 0;
00098   }
00099 };
00100 
00104 template <typename T>
00105 struct EqualTraits<T, false> {
00114   static bool equal_arrays(const T *p1, const T *p2, unsigned int size) {
00115     return std::equal(p1, p1 + size, p2);
00116   }
00117 };
00118 
00122 template <typename T>
00123 struct CopyTraits<T, true> {
00132   static void copy_array(T *dest, const T *source, unsigned int size) {
00133     memcpy(dest, source, size * sizeof(T));
00134   }
00135 };
00136 
00140 template <typename T>
00141 struct CopyTraits<T, false> {
00150   static void copy_array(T *dest, const T *source, unsigned int size) {
00151     std::copy(source, source + size, dest);
00152   }
00153 };
00154 
00160 template <typename T>
00161 struct Traits : TraitsBase<T>,
00162                 AccumulationTraits<T>,
00163                 CopyTraits<T, std::tr1::has_trivial_copy<T>::value>,
00164                 EqualTraits<T, has_trivial_equal<T>::value> {};
00165 
00166 } // namespace kche_tree
00167 
00168 #endif
